apps.localizedDescription:
Enjoy a vast library of movies and shows with XP app. Discover new releases and your favorites across various genres, all in **one place**. Without the need of any subscriptions. 
**✨ Key Features:** 
**- Watch content in 4K with Orbit Source**  (more servers coming soon!) 
**- Offline Downloads** — Save your favorite movies and shows to watch.** 
**- Sync with P-Stream Account** — Keep your library and watch history synced across devices 
**- Save Watch History** — Easily pick up where you left off 

App made by Afyef(Xprime), Icon by Simsalabim and source by BugHasRevenge

versions.localizedDescription:
## What's New
### Live Activity & Download Queue (#39 by @SimSalabimse)
Track your download progress right from your Lock Screen and Dynamic Island! Queue multiple downloads and
watch them complete one by one.
### Download Speed & Time Estimates (#38 by @SimSalabimse)
Downloads now show real-time speed (MB/s), remaining file size, and estimated time to completion.
### Offline Playback Detection (#26 by @SimSalabimse)
When you have a downloaded version of content, the app now asks if you want to play the offline version or
stream online.
### Storage Size Display (#18 by @SimSalabimse)
See exactly how much space your downloads are using in the Downloads tab.
### Download Progress Display (#16 by @SimSalabimse)
Downloads now show accurate progress bars and percentage completion in the Downloads tab.

---
## What's Fixed
### App Lag During Downloads (#15 by @SimSalabimse)
Fixed the lag that occurred throughout the app when downloads were active.
### Cancel Download Button
The cancel (X) button on downloading episodes now works properly.

---
## Direct Install

Or download signed app directly without requiring sideloading steps. Provided by @brohammy
## This is an external solution that is not managed by the XP Team. Copy paste this in your browser

> `itms-services://?action=download-manifest&url=https://github.com/OneANDD/plist-files/releases/download/Xp/XPSigned.plist`


*(Tested in Safari)*

## What's Fixed

  ### Download Progress Tracking
  Downloaded episodes now properly track and resume from where you left off. Progress is saved locally and
  automatically syncs to the server when you're back online. (#19 by @SimSalabimse)

  ### Progress Sync Improvements
  Watch progress now properly syncs across all playback methods. No more starting from the beginning every
  time! (#28 by @ibrahimarijuanaa)

  ### Episode Label UI Fix
  Fixed episode labels in downloads section wrapping across two lines. Everything now displays cleanly on a
  single line. (#17 by @SimSalabimse)

  ### Auto-Scroll to Latest Episode
  Media info now automatically scrolls to your most recently watched episode with smooth animation. (#14 by
  @SimSalabimse)

  ### Player Improvements
  - Removed premature VLC buffering timeout
  - Added 30-second safety timeout to prevent infinite buffering
  - Better handling of large seeks in downloaded files

  ### WebView Stability
  - Fixed memory leaks in Turnstile verification
  - Added retry limits to prevent infinite loops
  - Improved JavaScript error handling

## What's Fixed
- Added a custom navigation bar with full search functionality
- Improved compatibility for iOS versions below 26
- Issued by @chocomilkysideloading

📌 Baseline Milestone: Version 1.0.6

This release marks the **baseline for the complete milestone** for XP-App.

Enhancements:
- Added Liquid Glass native tab view for home — Issued by @afyef.
- Implemented Offline Download functionality — Issued by @afyef.

Bug Fixes:
- Minor performance improvements and stability fixes.

## ✨ Enhancements

- Added Search Functionality — issued by @afyef
